thread.section_title: Premier Dead Sea USA Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Premier Dead Sea USA | www.premierdeadsea-usa.com
thread.title: Kimberly
thread.title_full: Premier Dead Sea USA reviewed by Kimberly

author: Kimberly
title: Kimberly
text: When I got my oder .I only got part of it. I called Cheslsie very nice lady. She quickly got the mix up taken care of .Got the rest of my oder sent to me right away. I would definitely recommend this company.i will buy from them.again. exspecailly after Cheslsie took care of the problem so quickly.she even sent a extra gift.very nice lady excellent company. Their products are worth it. Exspecailly the body butter and the sea salt.it makes ur skin so soft. If u have dry shin u need to buy that it's way better then any lotion u can buy in the stores.
